description: This file initializes an Agent with SQLite storage and DuckDuckGo tools, then makes several queries through the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with storage and tools.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in an SQLite database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
